Artist, Mother, Kissy Face, Poet, Survivor. A little broken, but, working on repairs. Bite me. Try it. I double dog dare ya..!!
Nov 26, 2016

I’m falling for you

In Bits and Pieces

I’m falling for you
In bits and pieces.
Parts of my heart yield to your presence

I’m falling for you
One puzzle piece at a time

I’m falling for you
Like night follows the day
Like dawn follows the dusk

I’m falling for you
And I’m certain to scare you
Because you are newly freed
From the tyranny
Of another

I’m falling for you
Like the breeze moves the trees
Like the light of the sun stirs the leaves

I’m falling for you
In the aftermath of the pain
of the rejection of one who was played

I’m falling for you
With your kindness and your trust
Your dedication and our lust

I’m falling for you
You and your honesty
Your children and your love so very wakened
Your dedication to truth
And your pain

I’m falling for you
Your chocolate brown eyes
And your response to my touch
And mine to you
There was never so much

I’m falling for you
Are you falling for me?
Will you let it be?
Will you be with me?

I’m falling for you
In a vacuum of trust
I cannot bear
I cannot hear
The lack of trust in your words

I’m falling for you
And I know that I must
Remove myself before I’m broken
Again. I am certain that

I’m falling for you
And I must 
I must
But I cannot
Because

I’m falling for you
My love is doomed
When you don’t trust
